attributes.action: send non working immigrants home, stop paying them benefits, therfore saving millions of pounds per year!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Anyone who wants to come into Britain and work are welcome, but there are plenty who don't and just want to take from the government and the common people and not give anything back. I feel we should send these people packing and not allowed anymore in. Yes they should be given an opportunity to find work, say 6 months, and if they don't then send them packing so we can at least save some money in this crisis!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
